meanings.definition: In a manner that cannot be forgotten or erased from memory.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was unforgettably beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She sang unforgettably at the talent show.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's unforgettably cute antics made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The mountain view was unforgettably majestic.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the homemade pie was unforgettably delicious.
